snippet: A former transportation official and mentor to New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie "should not get a get-out-of-jail card" for using his position to shake down United Airlines to relaunch a flight to his weekend home, federal prosecutors argue in a cou...
lead_paragraph: A former transportation official and mentor to New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie "should not get a get-out-of-jail card" for using his position to shake down United Airlines to relaunch a flight to his weekend home, federal prosecutors argue in a court filing.
